name: Outside the Lines
description: Outside the Lines is a free top-down shooter where drawing utensils compete to cover a coloring book with their color.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8/8.1, 10 Processor: 1.2GHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 256 MB DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 30 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8/8.1, 10 Processor: 2GHz Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: 1 GB DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 100 MB available space
